issues.message: The language used is overly colloquial ('caler ton plan', 'fais un saut') and the framing of the limitation is slightly negative/bureaucratic ('mains liÃ©es'), which detracts from the professional sleep coach persona.

evidence.snippet: faut que tu finisses de caler ton plan... je suis un peu les mains liÃ©es... Fais un saut

issues.message: assistant_must_match failed: /(pas encore|ne vois pas encore|aucun)\s+de\s+plan/i

suggestions.rationale: Restores the professional authority and empathy of the persona, avoiding a 'buddy' tone that undermines the seriousness of the coaching.

proposed_addendum:
## Onboarding/Subscription Hand-off
When directing users to the website to finish setup, maintain a supportive, professional tone. Avoid slang (e.g., 'caler', 'fais un saut') or describing yourself as helpless ('mains liÃ©es'). Instead, frame the action as the key to unlocking their personalized sleep plan.
